participant_id.Description: Unique BIDS identifier for the participant in this study.

macv_q1.Description: One's belief in God or Higher Power(s) gives inner strength and meaning to life. | 1 = Not at All; 2 = A Little; 3 = Somewhat; 4 = Very Much; 5 = Completely

macv_q2.Description: Parents should teach their children that the family always comes first. | 1 = Not at All; 2 = A Little; 3 = Somewhat; 4 = Very Much; 5 = Completely

macv_q3.Description: Children should be taught that it is their duty to care for their parents when their parents get old. | 1 = Not at All; 2 = A Little; 3 = Somewhat; 4 = Very Much; 5 = Completely

macv_q4.Description: Children should always do things to make their parents happy. | 1 = Not at All; 2 = A Little; 3 = Somewhat; 4 = Very Much; 5 = Completely

macv_q5.Description: People should learn how to take care of themselves and not depend on others. | 1 = Not at All; 2 = A Little; 3 = Somewhat; 4 = Very Much; 5 = Completely

macv_q6.Description: God or Higher Power(s) is first; family is second. | 1 = Not at All; 2 = A Little; 3 = Somewhat; 4 = Very Much; 5 = Completely

macv_q7.Description: Family provides a sense of security because they will always be there for you. | 1 = Not at All; 2 = A Little; 3 = Somewhat; 4 = Very Much; 5 = Completely

macv_q8.Description: If a relative is having a hard time financially, one should help them out if possible. | 1 = Not at All; 2 = A Little; 3 = Somewhat; 4 = Very Much; 5 = Completely

macv_q9.Description: When it comes to important decisions, the family should ask for advice from close relatives. | 1 = Not at All; 2 = A Little; 3 = Somewhat; 4 = Very Much; 5 = Completely

macv_q10.Description: The most important thing parents can teach their children is to be independent from others. | 1 = Not at All; 2 = A Little; 3 = Somewhat; 4 = Very Much; 5 = Completely

macv_q11.Description: Parents should teach their children how to pray. | 1 = Not at All; 2 = A Little; 3 = Somewhat; 4 = Very Much; 5 = Completely

macv_q12.Description: It is always important to be united as a family | 1 = Not at All; 2 = A Little; 3 = Somewhat; 4 = Very Much; 5 = Completely

macv_q13.Description: A person should share their home with relatives if they need a place to stay | 1 = Not at All; 2 = A Little; 3 = Somewhat; 4 = Very Much; 5 = Completely

macv_q14.Description: As children get older their parents should allow them to make their own decisions | 1 = Not at All; 2 = A Little; 3 = Somewhat; 4 = Very Much; 5 = Completely

macv_q15.Description: If everything is taken away, one still has their faith in God or Higher Power(s). | 1 = Not at All; 2 = A Little; 3 = Somewhat; 4 = Very Much; 5 = Completely

macv_q16.Description: It is important to have close relationships with aunts/uncles, grandparents, and cousins. | 1 = Not at All; 2 = A Little; 3 = Somewhat; 4 = Very Much; 5 = Completely

macv_q17.Description: Older kids should take care of and be role models for their younger brothers and sisters. | 1 = Not at All; 2 = A Little; 3 = Somewhat; 4 = Very Much; 5 = Completely

macv_q18.Description: Children should be taught to always be good because they represent the family. | 1 = Not at All; 2 = A Little; 3 = Somewhat; 4 = Very Much; 5 = Completely

macv_q19.Description: When there are problems in life, a person can only count on him or herself. | 1 = Not at All; 2 = A Little; 3 = Somewhat; 4 = Very Much; 5 = Completely

macv_q20.Description: It is important to thank God or Higher Power(s) every day for all one has. | 1 = Not at All; 2 = A Little; 3 = Somewhat; 4 = Very Much; 5 = Completely

macv_q21.Description: Holidays and celebrations are important because the whole family comes together. | 1 = Not at All; 2 = A Little; 3 = Somewhat; 4 = Very Much; 5 = Completely

macv_q22.Description: Parents should be willing to make great sacrifices to make sure their children have a better life. | 1 = Not at All; 2 = A Little; 3 = Somewhat; 4 = Very Much; 5 = Completely

macv_q23.Description: A person should always think about their family when making important decisions. | 1 = Not at All; 2 = A Little; 3 = Somewhat; 4 = Very Much; 5 = Completely

macv_q24.Description: Parents should encourage children to solve their own problems. | 1 = Not at All; 2 = A Little; 3 = Somewhat; 4 = Very Much; 5 = Completely

macv_q25.Description: It is important to follow the Word of God or Higher Power(s). | 1 = Not at All; 2 = A Little; 3 = Somewhat; 4 = Very Much; 5 = Completely

macv_q26.Description: It is important for family members to show their love and affection to one another. | 1 = Not at All; 2 = A Little; 3 = Somewhat; 4 = Very Much; 5 = Completely

macv_q27.Description: It is important to work hard and do one's best because this work reflects on the family. | 1 = Not at All; 2 = A Little; 3 = Somewhat; 4 = Very Much; 5 = Completely

macv_q28.Description: Religion should be an important part of one's life. | 1 = Not at All; 2 = A Little; 3 = Somewhat; 4 = Very Much; 5 = Completely

macv_comprehend.Description: Did youth meet comprehension criteria? | 1 = Yes; 0 = No

macv_admin.Description: Please indicate how instrument was administered: | 1 = RA-Administered; 2 = Youth Self-Administered; 3 = Combination

macv_y_ss_fs.Description: Family Support Sum Score mean([macv_q2], [macv_q7], [macv_q12], [macv_q16], [macv_q21], [macv_q26]) Validation: All items must be answered

macv_y_ss_fo.Description: Family Obligation mean([macv_q3], [macv_q8], [macv_q13], [macv_q17], [macv_q22]) Validation: All questions must be answered

macv_y_ss_fr.Description: Family Referrent Sum Score  mean[macv_q4], [macv_q9], [macv_q18], [macv_q23], [macv_q27]) Validation: All items must be answered
